## getSourceContents() function

Tries both `sourcesContent` and `sources` paths

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getSourceContents(normalizedSourceMappingURL: string, sourceMapConsumer: BasicSourceMapConsumer | IndexedSourceMapConsumer, dependencies: GetSourceContentsDependencies): Promise<Record<string, string>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  normalizedSourceMappingURL | string |  |
|  sourceMapConsumer | BasicSourceMapConsumer \| IndexedSourceMapConsumer | <code>new SourceMapConsumer()</code> from <code>source-map</code> package |
|  dependencies | [GetSourceContentsDependencies](./dl-webapp-sources.getsourcecontentsdependencies.md) | only necessary for trying <code>sources</code> paths |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Record&lt;string, string&gt;&gt;

- mapping from source path to source contents

## Example


```typescript
let compiledJsUrl, dependencies

const compiledJsStr = await fetchFile(compiledJsUrl, dependencies)
const sourceMapUrl = normalizeSourceMappingURL(
  compiledJsUrl,
  getSourceMappingURL(compiledJsStr),
  dependencies,
)
const sourceMapStr = await fetchFile(sourceMapUrl, dependencies)
const sourceMapConsumer = await new SourceMapConsumer(sourceMapStr)
const sourceContents =
  await getSourceContents(sourceMapUrl, sourceMapConsumer, dependencies)
```
